Package command

Class setConditionCommand

  • java.lang.Object
    • command.setConditionCommand
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Command
    public class setConditionCommand
extends java.lang.Object
implements Command
    A class that holds all the information about the action where a block got connected as a condition to a surroundingBlock. This information consists of the objects blockToConnect, surroundingBlock and nextBlock (the block that was previously connected as a condition). The class also specifies what must happen to undo and execute this command.
    Version:
    3.0
    Author:
    Andreas Awouters, Thomas Van Erum, Dirk Vanbeveren, Geert Wesemael

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      setConditionCommand​(SurroundingBlock surroundingBlock, ConditionBlock blockToConnect, ConditionBlock nextBlock, GameController GC)
      Makes a Command used to set the condition of a surrounding block.

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void execute()
      Executes this command and makes the required changes for this command.
      void undo()
      Undoes this command and makes the required changes for this Command.This command can be a connectingCommand, disconnectingCommand, MakeBlock, drag Block etc.

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

        Makes a Command used to set the condition of a surrounding block.
        Parameters:
        blockToConnectTo - block before group of blocks connected
        blockToConnect - first block of group of blocks that gets connected.
        nextBlock - block after group of blocks connected
